proposedChanges.value: Add a concise subheadline under the main headline.
proposedChanges.rationale: Offers immediate clarity on what LaunchBase does.

proposedChanges.value: Move trust signals above the fold, near the hero section.
Place a prominent CTA button directly in the hero section.
proposedChanges.rationale: Encourages immediate action from first interaction.

proposedChanges.value: Simplify pricing layout into three clear tiers.
proposedChanges.rationale: Easy comparison reduces cognitive load, aiding decision.

proposedChanges.value: Incorporate client testimonials with specific results.
proposedChanges.rationale: Increases auditability and real-world proof of value.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure CTA buttons are always visible on mobile scroll.
proposedChanges.rationale: Maintains conversion path even on mobile devices.

proposedChanges.value: Increase visual weight of key sections with color and size.
proposedChanges.rationale: Directs attention to important information easily.

proposedChanges.value: Add a final CTA with summary benefits at the page end.
proposedChanges.rationale: Encourages conversion after full content engagement.

risks: Changes could disrupt current design harmony
Potential increase in bounce rate if misaligned
assumptions: Users require immediate clarity and trust
Mobile users are a significant segment
